name: Magna Carta: The Phantom of Avalanche
name_original: Magna Carta: The Phantom of Avalanche
description:
Magna Carta: The Phantom of Avalanche is a RPG game developed by Softmax. It was originally released in 2002. It was published by Softmax. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Magna Carta: The Phantom of Avalanche on PC.
It was produced by Joo-Hwan Lee and Young-Hee Jeong. Yeon-Kyu Choi directed the game. Hyung-Woo Noh, Sang-Ho Lee and Sung-Woon Jang scored the game.
